column1: Table Dg225-252 Books published  by subject: 1880?1999 \1 \2

column30: Imports (hard-bound and trade paperbacks), including new editions

column2: For 1880 ? 1919, includes pamphlets; for 1920 ? 1928, pamphlets included in total only; thereafter, pamphlets excluded.
The definition of a book was changed in 1959, and counting methods were changed in 1967.  Data before and after each of these two changes, therefore, are not strictly comparable.  See text.
Beginning in 1997, the R. R. Bowker Company introduced a new and more comprehensive system for tabulating books published in the United States.  See text.
Agrees with source; however, figures for components do not add to total shown.
